TopicTitle: Right-side shift no longer works with mouse wheel for zoom in VAB

Articles.Content: As title says. Left shift works, right shift does not.

3 minutes ago, godefroi said:

As title says. Left shift works, right shift does not.

But the title doesn't say anything about your system or install.

What os?

What mods are installed?

Did you:

check a different keyboard?

Try another usb port?

Tried the Keyboard on another computer?

Checked the Keymap in your os? (Sometimes it remaps keys to other functions...sometimes programs do that too)

The default keybinding was changed to cater for OS-X users.
there is only one primary, but as its bindable so you can go into keyboard/control settings and change it back.

Apologies here - that one would be my fault. I exposed the keybinding so its configurable, but only set a primary as Left-Shift. Missed the fact that right-shift was caught and wouldnt clash with the modifier on linux - my bad.

You can bind right-shift as a secondary for that in the keybindings, and I'll put it back in the defaults for the future release.

Sorry again
Thanks. Forgot to mention I was on Windows.
